en: "You couldn't tell your father goodbye back then, and now you won't get to tell your mother goodbye either."
zh_TW: "妳先前無法向妳的父親道別，而現在也無法向母親道別了。"

en: "What if I told you that someone you know is in here with you?"
zh_TW: "如果我告訴妳妳認識的人也在這裡呢？"

en: "I know you're thinking you can escape with them..."
zh_TW: "我知道妳在想著可以跟他們逃走..."

en: "...but these rituals have no way back. They were never designed that way."
zh_TW: "但是這些儀式沒有回頭路。它們不是這麼運作的。"

en: "Why would you give your prey an escape?"
zh_TW: "為什麼我要讓自己的獵物逃走？"

en: The figures are bunched up against the glass.
The glass seems to be giving out.
Kat, I know more about you than you think.
zh_TW: 凱特，我比妳想像的更瞭解妳。

en: The door is stuck. It won't open.
zh_TW: 門被卡住了。沒辦法打開。
